skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
New groups of cutthroats and murderers must be found to replenish the ranks.
Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Reaver keeps private chests filled with riches stashed away, to be used to persuade the Druchii nobility... and provide for any personal desire.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
Take it all!
Don't kill everyone, we will be back.
Flexible and deadly combination of sword and handbow.

effects.description: Weapon: Sword and Handbow (fire while moving with 360 fire arc)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Deadly greatsword that can strike multiple enemies simultaneously.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
With promises of endless loot and vulernable shores to raid, Corsairs are more willing to accept a lesser payment for their services.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Fleetmaster makes sure the blades and bolts of his crew have been sharpened to perfection prior to boarding enemy vessels.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for Dreadspears, Darkshards, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +7% for Dreadspears, Darkshards, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Dreadspears, Darkshards, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Just the name of this Reaver inspires fear and dread in those who hear it, any Corsair would be eager to join his crew.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Seeing the savagery of their Reaver in combat inspires and frightens Corsairs under his command to fight harder and more ferociously than ever.

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +1 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Black Ark Corsairs units
	(Hero's army)

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.
When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
	(local region)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags
	(own local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."
Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
From shadows we came...

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: They will pay for what should be ours!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves
	(armies in local owned region)
Income from post-battle loot: +10% against High Elves

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deadly and fast as northern wind.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Harpies units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: They don't need armour to kill their enemies. Bloody!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 when attacking
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: They will tremble... You too, in time...
For Khaine!
